    • Method Detail

      • scheduleHtmlMail

        UUID[] scheduleHtmlMail​(String source,
                        String from,
                        String to,
                        String subject,
                        String content,
                        de.mhus.lib.core.IReadProperties properties,
                        String... attachments)
                 throws de.mhus.lib.errors.MException
        Schedule the given mail content as html mail. And send a separate mail to every recipient.
        Parameters:
        source -
        from - From address or null for the default sender address
        to - Minimum set one recipient address.
        subject - The subject as string
        content - The content as string or the File Queue uri starting with "dfq:"
        properties -
        attachments - List of File Queue URIs to load the attachments
        Returns:
        The task ids of the created tasks
        Throws:
        de.mhus.lib.errors.MException

      • getLastSendAttempt

        Date getLastSendAttempt​(UUID id)
                 throws de.mhus.lib.errors.MException
        Return the last send attempt. In case of success the time of time of sent.
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        The date or null if not set
        Throws:
        de.mhus.lib.errors.MException - Throws if id is not found
